# Libraries

```{r libraries, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("ddplot")
```

# ggplot theme

```{r set-ggplot-defaults}
update_geom_defaults("line", list(alpha = 0.65, size = 0.65))

theme_set(theme_dereck())
```

# Load data

```{r load-data}
data <- readRDS("./outputs/united-states-of-america/all_merged_data.Rds")
```

# County level

```{r}
data %>%
	ggplot(aes())
```
